common.healthTipContent: Stay hydrated! Drinking at least 8 glasses of water daily helps maintain energy levels and supports overall health.

error.title: Error

social.webinarDescription: Join us for a live discussion on maintaining health in a busy lifestyle.

pwa.installPrompt: Install CareAI on your device for a better experience, even when offline.
pwa.installPromptIOS: Install CareAI on your iOS device for a better experience.
pwa.iosStep1: Tap the Share button at the bottom of the screen.
pwa.iosStep2: Scroll down and tap 'Add to Home Screen'.
pwa.iosStep3: Tap 'Add' in the top right corner.
pwa.offlineMessage: You are currently offline. Some features may be limited.
pwa.updateAvailable: A new version is available. Refresh to update.
